resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/103440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205728</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Little House in the Census: Almanzo and Laura Ingalls Wilder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenig Haus in der Zählung: Almanzo und 
Laura Ingalls wilder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peu de Chambre dans le recensement : Almanzo
et Laura Ingalls plus sauvage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pouca casa no census: Almanzo e Laura 
Ingalls mais selvagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poca Camera nel censimento: Almanzo e Laura 
Ingalls più selvaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λίγο σπίτι στην απογραφή: Almanzo και 
Laura Ingalls Wilder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poca casa en el censo: Almanzo y Laura 
Ingalls más salvaje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">displays records from the 1880 and 1990 census schedules showing that Laura Ingalls, Almanzo Wilder, and families of the popular Little House on the Prairie series were not mere characters but were real people. Teaching activities are included to help students learn more about the census.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bildschirmanzeigesätze von den 
Zählungzeitplänen 1880 und 1990, die zeigen, daß Laura Ingalls, 
wilderes Almanzo und Familien des populären kleinen Hauses auf der 
Graslandserie nicht bloße Zeichen aber waren, wirkliche Leute 
waren. Unterrichtende Aktivitäten sind eingeschlossen, um 
Kursteilnehmern zu helfen, mehr über die Zählung zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les enregistrements d'affichages des programmes 
1880 et 1990 de recensement prouvant que Laura Ingalls, Almanzo plus 
sauvage, et familles de la petite Chambre populaire sur la série de 
prairie n'étaient pas de seuls caractères mais étaient de vraies 
personnes. Des activités d'enseignement sont incluses pour 
aider des étudiants à apprendre plus au sujet du recensement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os registros dos indicadores das programações 
1880 e 1990 do census que mostram que Laura Ingalls, Almanzo mais 
selvagem, e as famílias da casa pequena popular na série da pradaria
não eram meros caráteres mas eram povos reais. As atividades 
ensinando são incluídas para ajudar a estudantes aprender mais sobre
o census.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i record delle visualizzazioni dai programmi 1880 
e 1990 di censimento che indicano che Laura Ingalls, Almanzo più 
selvaggio e le famiglie della Camera piccola popolare sulla serie del 
prairie non erano caratteri puri ma erano gente reale. Le 
attività d'istruzione sono incluse per aiutare gli allievi ad 
imparare più circa il censimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχεία παρουσιάσεων από τα προγράμματα απογραφής 
1880 και του 1990 που δείχνουν ότι η Laura Ingalls, 
Almanzo πιό άγριο, και οικογένειες του δημοφιλούς μικρού 
σπιτιού στη σειρά λιβαδιών δεν ήταν μόνοι χαρακτήρες αλλά ήταν
πραγματικοί άνθρωποι. Οι δραστηριότητες διδασκαλίας 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται για να βοηθήσουν τους σπουδαστές να μάθουν 
περισσότερους για την απογραφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los expedientes de las visualizaciones de los 
horario 1880 y 1990 del censo que mostraban que Laura Ingalls, Almanzo
más salvaje, y las familias de la pequeña casa popular en la serie 
de la pradera no eran caracteres meros sino eran gente verdadera. 
Las actividades de enseñanza se incluyen para ayudar a 
estudiantes a aprender más sobre el censo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205728</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103440</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/little-house-in-the-census-almanzo-and-laura-ingalls-wilder</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
